title: Cigna's new plan to cover multi-million dollar gene therapies - Nasdaq.com
text: Sept 5 (Reuters) - Health insurer Cigna Corp  on Thursday announced a new program that covers costs for expensive gene therapies that will cut out-of-pocket payments for customers.

Spark Therapeutics Inc  and Novartis AG's  blindness therapy, Luxturna, and Novartis'$2.1 million spinal muscular atrophy treatment, Zolgensma, will be the first two gene therapies included in the program, the company said.
